Modeling the impact of nonpharmaceutical interventions on disease transmission. ( A) Different social distancing measures (e.g., school closures, work and social place closures, and older individuals distancing) reduce contact rates between individuals in different ways. To reduce the complexity of the model, and to understand their differential impacts, we assume that individuals are only affected by one of these measures, dependent on their age. Individuals aged 0 y to 24 y are affected by school closures (included in this are university closures).
